Is MetaMask not compatible with the Verus Ethereum bridge?

Actually, the provided information suggests that MetaMask is compatible with the Verus Ethereum bridge. The instructions for bridging from Ethereum to Verus using MetaMask are similar to those using Verus Mobile, and can be found by reading the first parts of a specific article.

# How to bridge from Ethereum to Verus

## Verus Mobile
Please read the first parts of [this article](https://medium.com/veruscoin/how-to-participate-in-the-verus-ethereum-bridge-launch-73aeeae1c76a). You can skip the part on preconverting.

## MetaMask
Please read the first parts of [this article](https://medium.com/veruscoin/how-to-participate-in-the-verus-ethereum-bridge-launch-73aeeae1c76a). You can skip the part on preconverting.
